metadata.title: CVE-2018-12019 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The signature verification routine in Enigmail before 2.0.7 interprets userids as status/control messages and does not correctly keep track of thestatus of multiple signatures, which allows remote attackers to spoofarbitrary email signatures via public keys containing crafted primary userids.

criterions.comment: enigmail package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
